nav.theArtwork: di art wok we dɛn mek
nav.briefHistory: shɔt istri bɔt art na spes

ritual.label: ritual we dɛn kin du
ritual.ariaLabel: Enta di ritual - Send wan nem to di Orbital Temple

footer.credits: Orbital Temple na wan art wok we Edson Pavoni mek, we dɛn mek wit kɔlabɔreshɔn wit Pedro Kaled, João Pedro Polito, Victor Baptista & João Victor Alves, André Biagioni, VK, Jonathan Querubina, Guilherme Bullejos, Eduardo Dias, Roberta Savian Rosa, Clara Marques, Sathi Roy, ɛn ɔl di wan dɛn we de kɔntinyu fɔ sɛn nem to dis tɛmpul.
